description: Number of essentially parallel series-parallel networks with n unlabeled edges, multiple edges not allowed.
references: Ji Li, Combinatorial Logarithm and Point-Determining Cographs, Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, 19 (3) (2012), #P8.
J. W. Moon, Some enumerative results on series-parallel networks, Annals Discrete Math., 33 (1987), 199-226 (the sequence q_n).
links: Index entries for sequences mentioned in Moon (1987)
maple: Q := x; q[1] := 1; for d from 1 to 40 do q[d+1] := c; Q := Q+c*x^(d+1); t0 := mul((1-x^j)^(-q[j]),j=1..d+1); t01 := series(t0,x,d+2); t05 := series(2*Q +1-x+x^2 -t01, x, d+2); t1 := coeff(t05,x,d+1); t2 := solve(t1,c); q[d+1] := t2; Q := subs(c=t2,Q); Q := series(Q,x,d+2); od: A058385 := n->coeff(Q,x,n);
mathematica: max = 31; f[x_] := Sum[a[k]*x^k, {k, 0, max}]; a[0] = 0; a[1] = 1; a[2] = 0; a[3] = 1; se = Series[ 1 - x + x^2 + 2*f[x] - Product[(1 - x^j)^(-a[j]), {j, 1, max}], {x, 0, max}]; sol = Solve[ Thread[ CoefficientList[ se, x] == 0]]; A058385 = Table[a[n], {n, 0, max}] /. First[sol] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 27 2011, after g.f. *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 20 2000
